modName: Weapons of the Dohvakiin - Dragon Soul Weapons
summary: Adds in weapons which become more powerful each time you kill a dragon with them.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red][size=3]Name : [/size][/color]Weapons of the Dohvakiin
[color=Red][size=3]Version : [/size][/color]2.1
[color=Red][size=3]Date : [/size][/color]10/09/12
[color=Red][size=3]Category : [/size][/color]Weapons
[color=Red][size=3]Author(s) : [/size][/color]Soul Limit
[Color=Red][size=3]Requirements : [/size][/color] Dawnguard (THERE IS A NON DAWNGUARD VERSION)
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[size=3]This mod will no longer be updated[/size]
[color=Red]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=Red][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------[/color]
[NOTE - This is NOT compatible with the new Dragonborn DLC, as i have yet to make it so!]

This mod currently adds in 2 new weapons, the Sword Of Dragons, and the Greatsword of Dragons.

These weapons use the dragonebone weapon textures, as I cannot create textures. Their base stats are the same as their Dragonbone counterpats.

What makes these weapons special is that not only do they deal more damage to dragons, when they kill a dragon, they will absorb part of its soul, making the weapon more powerful.

As it stands, the damage will increase every 2 dragon souls, up to a maximum of 20 dragon souls, once you have reached 20, the damage will no longer increase.

These weapons are craftable at any Forge, as long as you have the dragon smithing perk, under the Dragon section.

If you download the v2, make sure to download the 2.1 update as well, as this will put the weapons in the Dragon Section in the forge menu.
[color=Red][size=4]---Installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
To install this mod via a manual installation you must Extract the contents of the archive and then place the contents in your Skyrim/Data folder.

Make sure you make a backup of your MQKillDragonScript.pex before you install this.

To install the update, replace the current esp with the update one.
[color=Red][size=4]---Uninstallation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]----------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
To uninstall this mod via a Manual Uninstallation you must delete the .esp from your Skyrim/Data folder, then delete all the included Scripts

Replace the MQKillDragonScript.pex with the backup you made when you installed the mod.
[color=Red][size=4]Known issues and bugs:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
Should be bug free

[color=Red][size=4]Tools Used:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]------------------------[/color]
[url=http://newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40278]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url]
Creation Kit, Available on Steam

[color=Red][size=4]Future Plans:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------[/color]
I may in the future, depending on Popularity / Personal Preference, I could consider releasing more weapons.

If anyone is able to do really good looking looks/textures for these weapons and would be interested in doing some, please drop me a PM

If you want a type of weapon done, or want something changed, please drop a comment in the comments section and I will consider your request.

In the near future i plan to release the following:

1. An update to the current version (what update does will be released closer to release)
2. A non-dawnguard version of this mod
3. A weapon of similiar type, but focuses on undead rather than dragons.

[color=Red][size=4]Legal and licensing:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
First ask for my permission.

[color=Red][size=4]My Other Mods:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
